title: ’Don’t put that up on YouTube’
text:
Email a friend 
HE’S a world-famous flirt but this time his cheeky chappy persona has definitely backfired. 
Pop superstar Robbie Williams has been left red-faced after accidentally telling a sexy secretary joke to a 15-year-old girl on stage in Brisbane. 
The star picked out the girl, reportedly named Morgan, from the crowd, and commented on her “secretary look”. Oops ... Robbie Williams made his gaffe after picking the girl out of the crowd. Source: YouTube 
He told her: “I love that look. I love the look with the glasses, and the hair, it’s like a secretary look.” 
Williams then joked he would have to “clean up” his computer’s browsing history before his wife Ayda Field saw it. Sorry ... the superstar was taken aback when the girl informed him she was only 15. Source: YouTube 
When he asked the concertgoer how old she was, she told him she was there celebrating her 15th birthday. 
Pop star Williams replied: “Oh s--t.” Ultimate showman ... Robbie Williams drives fans wild at Brisbane Entertainment Centre. Picture: Peter Wallis Source: News Corp Australia 
As the Brisbane crowd laughed, Williams joked: “Don’t put that up on YouTube. It’ll be on YouTube, and then it’ll be in the newspapers, and then I’ll get arrested.” Party on ... Williams has brought his Let Me Entertain You tour to Australia. Picture: Peter Wallis Source: News Corp Australia 
He then launched into mega-selling hit She’s The One . 
Williams will continue his Let Me Entertain You national tour of Australia this week.
